title: Free Chen Guangcheng 自由光诚
content:
Mr. Chen Guangcheng and his family are under house arrest in China. We call for the freedom of Mr. Chen Guangcheng NOW! 墨镜肖像活动呼吁给与陈光诚及其家人自由！ Put on a pair of sunglasses(or blindfold), take a photo, write a few words, email to ichenguangcheng@gmail.com 一张墨镜照片一句话，发到ichenguangcheng@gmail.com For more information: 墨镜.肖像 Dark Glasses. Portrait http://ichenguangcheng.blogspot.com/

Follow this link:
Free Chen Guangcheng 自由光诚
